page.title: 16Events, Swainby & Potto
page.content: Annual events include children's {sports days}in Swainby and Potto to compete for cups, and there are associated fancy-dress competitions. Free teas are given to all residents. A Christmas{Fair}is held for Church and a Summer Fair for Chapel funds. During 1984-85 a local-history exhib- ition was staged in Swainby with old photographs and memorabilia contrib- uted by many persons and attended by over 600 visitors. A musical comedy, "Frankenstein, Crankenstein", was performed by{Swainby Choir}for two nights. An{Antique Fair}is held every 4 months; dealers from the region rent stalls in the Village Hall; profits from refreshments, provided by local residents,swell funds.{"Beating of the {Bounds"}of the parish was revived this year after 90 years. Over 40 stones were visited by 21 horseback riders.
